metadata.Title: CVE-2018-25010 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
A heap-based buffer overflow was found in libwebp in versions before 1.0.1in ApplyFilter().

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-25010` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libwebp6 - 0.6.1-2ubuntu0.20.04.1
libwebpdemux2 - 0.6.1-2ubuntu0.20.04.1
libwebpmux3 - 0.6.1-2ubuntu0.20.04.1
webp - 0.6.1-2ubuntu0.20.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libwebp package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.6.1-2ubuntu0.20.04.1').
